title: Lighter lemony pasta and spinach bake
description: Put together healthy veg with a yummy mustard and cheese sauce and you've got a great pasta bake.Each serving provides 459 kcal, 24g protein, 63g carbohydrate (of which 6.5g sugars), 11g fat (of which 5.5g saturates), 6g fibre and 0.6g salt.
ingredients: 100g/3½oz baby spinach, any thicker stems removed
2 spring onions, outer leaves removed, thinly sliced
1 unwaxed lemon, finely grated zest only
salt and freshly ground black pepper
mixed salad leaves dressed with a squeeze of lemon juice and 1 tsp olive oil, to serve
